(Spruce) M. Fleischer ex Brotherus in H. G. A. Engler et al.

place_of_publication.publication_title: in H. G. A. Engler et al., Nat. Pflanzenfam. ed.

bio:treatment.description: Plants to 12 cm, soft. Stems 1–3 mm wide across leafy stem, irregularly branched to loosely 1-pinnate, not frondose or bushy, branches turgid, innovations inconspicuous. Stem leaves erect to erect-spreading, loosely imbricate, becoming more tightly imbricate toward stem apices, ovate to elliptic-ovate, somewhat concave, 1.5–2.5 × 1–1.4 mm; margins serrulate to nearly entire proximally, serrate distally; apex abruptly narrowed; costa single; medial laminal cells 30–60 × 5–7 µm. Branch leaves imbricate, ovate-lanceolate to lanceolate, 1.3–2 × 0.4–0.9 mm; costa single. Seta 1–3 cm. Capsule ovoid, 1.3–1.8 mm.
